_PAGE_FILTER_EMAIL_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments:  
email (String): The email address for which the HTML link should be created
[linkClass] (String): A CSS class to be added to the created HTML link
_PAGE_FILTER_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterEmail creates an HTML link for an email address. It checks if the email address exists and is not empty. If the conditions are met, an HTML link in the format <a href="mailto:emailAdresse" class="linkClass">emailAdresse</a> is returned.
